actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize an investigation and study of coastal hazards from offshore drilling on the Outer Continental Shelf in the Atlantic Ocean.

summary.text: Authorizes an investigation and study by the National Academy of Sciences of coastal hazards from offshore drilling on the Outer Continental Shelf in the Atlantic Ocean. Authorizes appropriations of $500,000 annually for the fiscal year in which this Act is enacted, and for the succeeding fiscal year, in order to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an investigation and study of coastal hazards from offshore drilling on the Outer Continental Shelf in the Atlantic Ocean.
